settings.heading: Discover the magic IRL at Unicorn World

settings.text: Lola + The Boys retail locations are more than "just another store"; they are vibrant community hubs designed for little ones and the young at heart. Join us for exclusive events and on-site customizations, or book the ultimate private party. We can't wait to welcome you to our whimsical wonderland!

settings.title: Meet The Founder
settings.text: Frustrated by the lack of playful children's clothing options, Irina took matters into her own hands, sparking a creative journey to design the fun and colorful attire she envisioned for her kids and others.

settings.title: DESIGN YOUR OWN VIA OUR PATCH BAR
settings.text: Let your little ones unleash their creativity at our custom patch bar, where they can design sweaters as unique and colorful as their imaginations.
